verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Walk in the light
And thou shalt know
That fellowship of love
His spirit only can bestow
Who reigns in light above

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Walk in the light
And thou shalt find
Thy heart made truly His
Who dwells in cloudless
Light enshrined
In whom no darkness is

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Walk in the light
And sin abhorred
Shall ne'er defile again
The blood of
Jesus Christ the Lord
Shall cleanse from every stain

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Walk in the light
And e'en the tomb
No fearful shade shall wear
The glory shall dispel the gloom
For Christ hath conquered there

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Walk in the light
And thou shalt own
Thy darkness passed away
Because that light
Hath on thee shone
In which is perfect day

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Walk in the light
Thy path shall be
Peaceful serene and bright
For God by grace shall dwell in thee
And God Himself is Light
